name: 林震
objective: 先修課程：3001011或負責教授同意。力、質量與加速度、質點運動學、質點動力學、功與能、衝量與動量、剛體運動、剛體系的動力學。
schedule:
週次	單元主題
1	Introduction
2	Kinematics of Particles
3	Kinematics of Particles
4	Kinematics of Particles
5	Kinetics of Particles
6	Kinetics of Particles
7	Kinetics of Particles
8	Kinetics of Systems of Particles
9	Midterm Exam.
10	Plane Kinematics of Rigidy Bodies
11	Plane Kinematics of Rigidy Bodies
12	Plane Kinematics of Rigidy Bodies
13 	Plane Kinetics of Rigidy Bodies
14	Plane Kinetics of Rigidy Bodies
15	Plane Kinetics of Rigidy Bodies
16	3-Dimensional Kinematics of Rididy Bodies
17	3-Dimensional Kinematics of Rididy Bodies
18	Final
scorePolicy: 作業與隨堂測驗佔30%，期中考佔30%，期末考佔40%
materials: Engineering  Mechanics- Dynamics by Meriam 4th edition
